A, B = map(float, input().split())

print(int(A * B))

import sys

a, b = map(float, sys.stdin.readline().split())
print(int(a * b))

a, b = [float(x) for x in input().split()]
print(int(a*b))

import sys

A, B = map(float, sys.stdin.readline().split())
print(int(A * B))

A, B = map(float, input().split())
print(int(A * B))
